title: New: April Towers – Arcadia
body:
**April Towers** have featured on these pages in the past, however as is seemingly standard practice nowadays, everything has disappeared from their Soundcloud, and they’re back with a fresher, cleaner sound.

Fulfilling the potential of the early demos, _Arcadia_ nails the anthemic nature of The Lighting Seeds, with a modern, radio friendly sound more akin to Bastille or that hugely under appreciated One Night Only Return single, [Say You Don’t Want It](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AZa1ViT4Ihc). Check it out below.
